WRITING.TEXT: Aw, shucks

I flew out here for the weekend to just be in Wrigleyville for this amazing moment. So glad they won one of em. I hope they win it all, but for me, tonight, standing next to the Ron Santo statue and watching the Centerfield scoreboard record that last out, hearing the crowd roar, singing Go Cubs Go with everyone around me... It was all worth it.
I have to go back to LA now, where I will hide out in my local Chicago bar Tuesday night and hope to celebrate with my fellow displaced fans. Through the insanity of this month, I've realized a lot of things, the biggest being that there is an amazing comradery in sports, but the version that surround the Chicago Cubs fan base is just unmatchable in my eyes.
Thank you Chicago for allowing me to join in the insanity. All this has done is remind me how very much I want to move back home so that being a part of moments like this don't have to require cross country flights :).
The cubs are gonna win today.
My hero.
His best role, IMO.

This all reminds me of an interview is read once of Stephen Colbert. He wasn't playing the TV character, it was a real interview, and the interviewer asked him if Nixon was REALLY his favorite president, and his response was pretty moving, iirc, and really opened my eyes, for the first time, that there was more to the man than just Watergate. I can't find the article, but I found this quote which might be from it ?
"I have tender feelings for Nixon, because everybody has warm feelings about their childhood. Actually, I didn't like the Watergate trials 'cause they interrupted The Munsters... Nixon was the last liberal president. He supported women's rights, the environment, ending the draft, youth involvement, and now he's the boogeyman? Kerry couldn't even run on that today."
At least someone's recognizing him. Not a single mention of him I've heard through the World Series so far :(.

Totally fair. My post wasn't meant to be some kind of call out or bash either. I was just agreeing with the idea of not getting it, mainly from not being there and my experiences being exposure to negatives.
Totally understand the down voting, too, I just wanted to be clear that I am aware I'm coming from a pov of ignorance, so I don't blame anyone for doing so.

But that isn't the point. It's not, 'I'm not going because GSP isn't there' so much as it seems to be, 'I'm not going because this lackluster card didn't end up being the surprise return of GSP, and that's pretty fucked, considering how weak this card is.'

As a newish comer as well, the love for GSP baffles me. I'm content with the knowledge that I wasn't there so I won't get it, and I can respect that but from my perspective, he just seems to be a cheater who got out with his career intact, despite actually "losing" his last fight.
It's hard to undo first impressions. I've been trying to watch more of his fights and develop more of a respect for him, but so far it just hasn't stuck. :(
Is Lily Tomlin ms. Frizzle, and if so, how am I only just how learning this?!
I needed someone to write it out for me to get it but now I'm smiling.
Haha, I thought that was Zambrano and chuckled but couldn't figure out why he was included.
I haven't seen all of this before, and I'd never seen the Cyborg presser. I'm in tears.

*ahem*
Aaaaahhhhhhhh
*ahem*
Thank you.
This was my favorite joke as a kid, even though I didn't understand if for a long time because I didn't know what the word frayed meant.
I think I saw that Elvis Andrus did it in 2010.
I'm sure Jets fans appreciate you calling it that ;).

I was sitting here not getting it, and I kept repeating it in my head, went back to doing some work, still trying to figure it out, and then my brain kinda dosed and suddenly I had it. Let out one very loud chuckle before quickly keeping in the rest.

That's one version of a rather old urban legend in general.

And your dear, old Uncle Tony.
Aaaaaannddd read it in Morgan Freeman's voice. Is it possible not to?
*World Champ
Hello fellow Atomweight.
He's fighting in a little over a month...

Just saw today that he was no longer on 204. Managed to miss this story. I'm pretty heart broken. He's my favorite prospect and I've never had a chance to see him fight live. :\. And the test happened on my birthday. That's some kinda bad something.
Oh my God. Thank you.
The movie is, to be hyperbolic, probably the second most beautiful animated film I've ever seen, first being Spirited Away.
I thought they at least did the heroes journey a solid, even if they stuck to it like a road map.
It felt like you were suggesting that only SJWs could possibly have held those opinions. If I misunderstood your intent, my apologies (though my feeling on the subject itself still stands)

I am female, but don't consider myself a feminist, and I think these comments are absolutely juvenile and offensive towards women. As has already been pointed out many times, the suggestion that having a vagina and periods makes someone less of a fighter is a slap in the face to all of the successful female athletes in the UFC. IMO.
The issue for me will always be the suggestion that having a vagina is a weakness. Smolka can go fight JJ if he thinks it's such a hindrance.

Didn't like it then, still don't now \\__()__/
EDIT: My God, where are the rest of his arms? I know about the double slash, but why can't I do an underscore?
Anyone find a fix? I'm having the same problem.
Ben's tweets all night kinda rubbed me the wrong way. The guy pulled out of this card. No need to sit at home and talk shit.
You gonna pull a CM Punk and show HW how it's done?
Which is why he should've started out in amateur. There's not much lower a floor to start with than Gall. The kid only had two pro fights before tonight.
Hahaha, I couldn't understand what he was saying when I watched that live. Almost missed some prime D.C. right there. Thank ya.
Whyyyy was he allowed to continue???
That's absolutely fair.
Browne shouldn't be fighting anyone that highly ranked, IMO.
Not my mom.
All night, all I could think about was waiting for an update to this video.
I almost feel like I'm never going to get to see Waterson fight again. But I'm sure they'll find a match.

Maybe this is ignorant/wishful thinking/what have you, but I can't for the life of me understand why they didn't just replace Scoggins with Reis. I get that he had a rescheduled fight with another opponent, but if you move him to the main card against McCall, now you have two high ranked Flyweights going at it on the PPV instead of two unranked Flyweights. It seems like a simple fix and makes the PPV better...
I don't know if it's a good or bad thing that I laughed as hard as I did at the reference.
Bisping. Hendo. II.
I feel like it was even longer ago than that, but it hasn't been played up much at all, so I keep forgetting about it.
What am I looking at?
Is this card just absurd submissions?
Was coming here to say that. Oh my God, stop, you're making this worse.
Was anything else useful said? ESPN apparently thought that was the right time to leave the presser.
Wow. This wasn't what I expected at all.
Aww here we go.
Which is what makes him the most obvious option in my eyes. Until a couple weeks ago he was already in a fight camp, I imagine he didn't just quit preparing.
Never seen that before, thank you adding that to my life. I needed it on a day like today.
Seriously. That was my first though. You don't NEED that Fight Pass card.
That night...changed me.
I'd never stop laughing. Ever. I still burst into a little giggle fit when I remember he's the Middleweight champ from time to time.
Probably Silva texted him something like, "What about Mousasi" and that's why he accidentally said the name. I wouldn't hate that match.
Yeah, IMO, if this were to stay a LHW fight, Glover is the only option that makes sense, but I highly doubt it stays a LHW fight.
I appreciate your enthusiasm. I'm sure it's difficult to do without thumbs.
All of these people showing up here, doubting the hype. It sickens me.

Which course on tae Kim is yours? I have one that I stopped using a while ago, wouldn't mind giving it another stab.
I don't own the dictionary yet, so I'll try and remember to ask you for the link whenever I get my hands on it.
Thanks!

Oh this post. I like this post.
Oh God...I was OK...I was sad, but I was OK. Why did you point this out...why?
I'm thrilled for him. So the conditions aren't ideal, it's not like he truly "earned" the shot anyways. I'll be at this. My first event. I'm too excited.
Don't we at home also get free pizza or something though? I'll call it a Papa Slam if free food is involved.

WRITING.TEXT: Get ready for Maia / Brown. That should be a lot of fun. Or at the very least, a clinic on BJJ.

Oh yeah, that wasn't to suggest the UFC would have a problem with it, just that there's a lot of reasons for that fight to get booked.
Jacare, I don't see any reason why he wouldn't get the shot for winning.
I'm torn. My heart wants Stipe, my head says Werdum. I just *feel* like Stipe's going to light Werdum up as well, but expect Werdum to take it to the ground.
Who you hyped for?
I gotta think winner gets next. Especially if Rockhold beats Weidman and Belfort beats Jacare. You'd think even if the UFC might not want it, Rockhold's gotta want that L back.
Stann.

Actually, the article does state that it was the UFC's call. "The Arena da Baixadas security team is requesting fans to throw away the mask before they enter the stadium, and told MMA Fighting that the UFC made the call. "
And now that the advert is being pointed out to me, I'm assuming that very likely was the reason and am even sadder.

First, I find out no Rogan commentary for this, and I'm a little disappointed, but OK.
Then I lose Silva and Hall. Really bummed.
NOW THEY'VE TAKEN THE WERDUM MASK?! No more! I won't stand for it. I'll...I'll...OK, look. I'll do nothing. But dammit, I was really looking forward to Stipe's walkout tonight :(.
Barberena vs Northcutt is highly recommended ;).
Oh I am not knowledgeable on this stuff at all. You'd probably get a lot of help in one of the stickied threads for general questions, though.
There are 144 comments on an old video clip of Maia submitting Sonnen right now. There's nothing in that thread at all to talk about and yet...
This sub struggles?

I don't recall. I feel like I did see them, but I didn't really take a good look at them. In general, really, the quality of the stuff is nice, but the UFC branded stuff obviously gets the name recognition tax and is too expensive for anything other than fan apparel.

They do. Just go to a Reebok store.
Or are you referring to the hoodies specifically? I mean, they make those blank as well: http://www.reebok.com/us/ufc-walkout-hoodie/AO3495.html?cm_mmc=ReebokSEM_PLA-_--_--_--_-dv:eCom cm_mmc1=US utm_source=google utm_medium=cse utm_term=889132901696 gclid=CLWt0puk2swCFciIfgodY9EMfw
Or (can you see I'm working through this in my head as I write this?) do you mean with no UFC logos on them whatsoever? There could be some hope on their site there as well: http://www.reebok.com/us/hoodies
I was at the Reebok store last week and that was the first time I'd seen the fight kits in person. I liked the material a lot, but not enough to drop the cash on them. Some of their other training gear was legit very nice, though.
This question will haunt me til the end of my days.
haha, yep, recognized her immediately as no fun girl.
Noooooo. I haven't heard this song in years. It gets stuck in my head so badly too.

My life has been a nightmare since deciding he was my favorite fighter. I made this decision after seeing a replay of 187. The only fights of his I've seen live have been Mir, Miocic and Overeem. Not exactly something to keep the hype train running.
But I'm not fair-weather or anything. The guy has a great history, great legacy, that's not going away. I just wish I'd've been around to see it.
When I had a smoker, bacon was my favorite thing to make. Sure, it takes literally days of effort, but it's not a lot of work, and the payoff is incredible. Looks good, op.

When I was in McDonald's in Tokyo, I was reading the menu, and they thought I was struggling with it, so they picked it up from the counter (it was a mat on the counter, not the menu board) and flipped it over. All English on the reverse side.
A much nicer experience then when I was in an elevator in Kyoto and some guys kept referring to my friend and I as foreigners, thinking we didn't understand them.
Oh man, this guy stole my idea, lol. Every time I see Colin Hay live I bring a picture of the last time I met him and hold it up in front of us. This guy's pictures came out WAY better though.
Unless he said that outside the press conference, that was a very offhand comment I wouldn't put much stock in.
Had to see the end at least.

Wow...I was honestly really looking forward to this. I fell really hard for Thomson in his last UFC fight against Ferguson. I know he got pounded, but he had incredible heart, and he made me a fan. I missed his first two Bellator fights and was *really* looking forward to this one.
Is this seriously another AKA related situation, too? As someone who's a relatively new fan to the sport, they're seriously killing the vibe for me. I mean, this is insane, it really is. How can I get excited for a fight that one of their team is a part of at this point? How?
:(. I like Kamaru, that's too bad.
Ah, gotcha.

It's all situational though, I feel. In my opinion, on any given day, Johnson can beat anyone. But that comes with a caveat: It almost *has* to be in the first round. I mean, you saw what he did to Cormier. Yes, Cormier beat him, but not without a legit scare. I don't think AJ had the right plan for that fight, either. He seemed completely lost when his punch didn't finish the fight.
Not to make excuses, but Koscheck "beat" him. That fight disgusts me.
Slugulus Eructo

Off the top of my head: Stipe vs Arlovski, because the latter is my favorite fighter, and if he won that fight, you'd definitely be looking at him getting a title shot and I was so stupidly hyped about the whole thing. Yet, pretty aware he was going to lose, so it was some awful nerves/butterflies.
Holm / Rousey is the other one, because I bought into the last minute hype that Holm would win and I really wanted to see "history" made.
That's not how it works in Japanese.
